title: Repeated Password length more than 15 characters (16) if first password is valid

expected.message: Password has to be from 8 to 15 characters long and contain at least one integer, one capital, and one small letter

title: Repeated Password length less than 8 characters (7) if first password is valid

expected.message: Password has to be from 8 to 15 characters long and contain at least one integer, one capital, and one small letter
